title: The Assiduous Quest of Tobias Hopkins: Part Three: The Dutchman
description: The Assiduous Quest of Tobias Hopkins - Part Three: The DutchmanToby sets a course for the Island of Nevis where he reaps the fruits of his search. All appears well until he continues his voyage bound for Virginia. It is only here that Tobias Hopkins and his crew have to face the consequence of his actions.
author: James Faro
